Image.Text: Hello young Chemist. I am Avogadro Mole. [row] [row] No, I am not an anthromorphic subterranean creature. [row] [row] Then what is a mole you ask?

A mole is a standard unit of measurement in chemistry. A mole of a substance or a mole of particles is defined as 6.022 x 10^23 (3 s.f.) particles. [row] Let me tell you something good. You can find wild chemical compounds on checkered tiles!
Since you already know, let us have a battle of knowledge. Shall we begin?
Hope your reaction speed can keep up with mine!
Let me tell you something good.
